mapper.select: SELECT msc_no, msc_code, msc_name, msc_profit, msc_dividend, msc_payout_ratio, msc_comment, msc_status, msc_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM plugins_m_stock_company WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND msc_delete = '0' ORDER BY msc_no LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}

SELECT msc_no, msc_code, msc_name, msc_profit, msc_dividend, msc_payout_ratio, msc_comment, msc_status, msc_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM plugins_m_stock_company WHERE msc_no = #{mscNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND msc_delete = '0'

SELECT ust_no, ust_sale_day, ust_classify, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_fee, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, msc_no, msc_name, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM plugins_user_stock WHERE msc_no = #{mscNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0' ORDER BY ust_classify, ust_sale_day LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}

SELECT ust_no, ust_sale_day, ust_classify, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_fee, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM plugins_user_stock WHERE ust_no = #{ustNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'

SELECT ust_no, ust_sale_day, ust_classify, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_fee, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, msc_no, msc_name, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM plugins_user_stock WHERE msc_no = #{mscNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_sale_day > #{ustSaleDay} AND ust_delete = '0' ORDER BY ust_sale_day, ust_classify
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM plugins_m_stock_company WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND msc_delete = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM plugins_user_stock WHERE msc_no = #{mscNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'

SELECT msc_name FROM plugins_m_stock_company WHERE
user_id like '${userId}%' AND
msc_name like '%${mscName}%' AND
ust_delete = '0' ORDER BY msc_name LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}
